text: God fomɨra, gumazamiziba uan akar dɨkɨrɨzim me ganɨngizɨ, me fo, me gɨn an akam akɨrɨzir biziba iniam. Dughiar kam a deraghvɨra kamaghɨn men akaghasa ifongegha ghaze, nɨghnɨzir kam uam an otevkɨnighan kogham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a gavgavim uan akar dɨkɨrɨzim ganɨga uan ziam dɨbora ghaze, bar guizbangɨra.
